author: rse
msg: Remove already no longer needed define, because we replaced
all of its usages with ap_cpystrn() variants in the past.

author: rse
msg: Add own definition for RAND_MAX because some non-strict-POSIX
platforms don't define it although they provide the rand() function :-(

author: rse
msg: Made the generation of src/include/hide.h more robust and complete
and commit an updated version of this header file.
